H3.text: who is the writer of 50 shades of grey. E.L. James

A4.text: Erika Mitchell (born 7 March 1963), known by her pen name E. L. James, is a British author.

A5.text: She wrote the best-selling Fifty Shades series of erotic romance novels, which spawned a multimedia franchise including a film trilogy of the same name.
